title: Not receiving password recovery email
body: My brother isn't receiving the email for his password that he forgot! can someone from riot please send the email to snip.  And its not showing up in spam or anywhere.  Its just not being sent. thanks

replies.body:
I had this problem today actually.... I waited and waited but no email what so ever.

I finally realised that I was logging into the wrong region. So make sure you're logging in correctly that way first, when I realised and entered all my log in details again, it worked perfectly.
sometimes, it can take a while. despite most times it being received instantly, i haven't received automated emails for over a day on occasion.

I've snipped out the information for privacy reasons.  Have your brother reach out to us in a [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
